name: SkillWarz
description:
SkillWarz is modern first person shooter game.  Game is still in development and more content will be added in future updates. At this moment game has 3 game modes (DM, TDM and Gun Game) on more then 20 maps.

Some features:
* Statistics
* Progression
* Unlocks
* Map vote
* Customization
* Leaderboard

We have community forum:  https://skillwarz.com
There you can read all information about game and report bugs, cheaters.
Active members can even get administrator rights in game.
We have also Map Editor,  which can be used to show us your map ideas. 

More game screenshots can be found in this album on Facebook.
And some videos on YouTube.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Ctrl - Crouch
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse Wheel, or keys 1 and 2 | Switch primary/secondary weapon
  • R - Reload weapon
  • Q - Melee attack
  • G - Primary grenade
  • F - Secondary grenade
  • X - Change fire mode
  • Chat:
    - Return, or Y | Open chat
    - Return | Send message
    - Escape, or Return | Close chat
  • M, or Tilde(~) -  Open in-game menu
  • E - Interact
  • Tab - Scoreboard

Controls can be changed in settings.

System Requirements

OS: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.11+, Ubuntu 12.04+
Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
CPU:  with SSE2 instruction set support.

RECOMMENDED
Processor:  Intel Core i5 2500 / AMD FX 8350  or better
Memory:  4 GB RAM
Graphics:  Geforce GTX 570 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or better
Storage:  3 GB available space

Game runs well also on older/weaker systems.
Test on 10 years old computer:

  • Windows 10
  • AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5600+ (2.94 GHz)
  • ATI Radeon 3870 (GDDR4 512 MB)
  • RAM 2GB

LOW quality:
Windowed mode (1280x720) - 160 FPS
Fullscreen mode (1920x1080) - 100 FPS

Linux version will be back soon.
